column2: Job Title: Senior SEO Executive Location: Work From Home Company Overview: Booster Water is a dynamic and innovative company committed to delivering high-quality products to our customers. We pride ourselves on fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented work environment where employees are encouraged to contribute their ideas and drive results. As part of our expansion efforts, we are seeking a talented and driven SEO Executive to join our team. Position Overview: We are looking for an experienced Senior SEO Executive to manage search engine optimization and marketing activities. The Senior SEO Executive will be responsible for developing and implementing effective SEO strategies to drive organic traffic and improve website rankings on major search engines. The ideal candidate is analytical, detail-oriented, and up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in SEO. Key Responsibilities: Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify target keywords and phrases. Develop and implement SEO strategies to increase website visibility and organic traffic.  Optimize website content, including landing pages, blog posts, and product pages, for search engines.  Perform on-page and off-page SEO activities such as link building, content promotion, and website optimization. Monitor website performance using Google Analytics and other SEO tools to track key metrics and identify areas for improvement.  Collaborate with content creators, developers, and marketing teams to ensure SEO best practices are implemented across all digital assets.  Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and algorithm updates in SEO and search engine marketing.  Provide regular reports and insights on SEO performance, trends, and opportunities to key stakeholders Qualifications:  Bachelors degree in marketing, communications, or a related field. Proven experience as an SEO Executive or similar role, with a track record of improving website rankings and organic traffic.  Strong understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices. Proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, etc.  Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights.  Strong communication and collaboration skills with the ability to work cross-functionally.  Detail-oriented with the ability to manage multiple projects and priorities effectively.  Certifications in SEO or digital marketing (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads, etc.) are a plus. Salary: As per industry standards and depending upon candidates skills

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior SEO Executive to join our team     As a Senior SEO Executive, you will play a crucial role in driving organic search traffic and improving search engine rankings for our clients website     Your expertise in search engine optimization techniques, analytical skills, and strategic thinking will be key in developing and implementing effective SEO strategies                           Responsibilities:                         ?         Develop and execute comprehensive SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and drive targeted traffic to the clinets website.                               Conduct in-depth keyword research to identify valuable opportunities for content optimization and expansion.                             Perform competitive analysis to stay updated on industry trends, identify gaps, and recommend strategies to outperform competitors.                             Optimize website content, including meta tags, headings, URLs, and on-page content, to improve search engine visibility and user experience.                             Conduct technical SEO audits to identify and resolve issues that could impact search engine rankings, such as broken links, duplicate content, and website speed.                             Collaborate with content creators to develop and optimize high-quality, SEO-friendly content that aligns with the companys goals and target audience.                             Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools, Google Analytics, and other relevant data sources. Generate reports and provide insights on key metrics and trends.                             Stay updated on the latest SEO trends, algorithm updates, and industry best practices. Implement changes and adapt strategies accordingly.                             Stay informed about emerging digital marketing technologies and opportunities, such as voice search, mobile optimization, and schema markup, and explore their potential impact on SEO strategies.                             Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, web development, and design, to ensure SEO best practices are integrated into all aspects of the website and digital marketing initiatives.                             Mentor and provide guidance to junior SEO team members, sharing knowledge and expertise to foster their professional growth.    Qualifications:                               Minimum 1.5 to 4 years of experience in SEO                             Bachelors degree in marketing, business, or a related field.                             Proven experience working in SEO, preferably in a senior or lead role.                             In-depth knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.                             Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data, draw insights, and make data-driven decisions.                             Proficient in using SEO tools, such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, or similar platforms.                             Experience with website analytics and performance tracking tools.                             Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and present insights and recommendations.                             Strong project management skills and the ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.                             Up-to-date with the latest industry trends, algorithm updates, and best practices.                             Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently or as part of a team.           This job description outlines the general responsibilities and qualifications for the role of a Senior SEO Executive. It is important to note that specific duties may vary depending on the company s requirements and the evolving nature of the SEO landscape.

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior SEO Specialist to join our team. As a Senior SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for leading and executing advanced search engine optimization strategies to drive organic traffic, improve search rankings, and enhance the online visibility of our website. This role requires a deep understanding of SEO principles, advanced technical knowledge, and a proven track record of delivering successful SEO campaigns.         Responsibilities:         Develop and implement comprehensive SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and visibility.     Conduct in-depth keyword research and analysis to identify target keywords and phrases.     Optimize on-page elements, including meta tags, headings, URLs, and website content, to maximize search engine visibility and user experience.     Perform technical SEO audits to identify and resolve issues affecting website performance, crawlability, and indexability.     Collaborate with web developers to implement technical SEO recommendations, such as website speed optimization, mobile optimization, and structured data implementation.     Plan and execute advanced off-page optimization activities, including link building campaigns, influencer partnerships, and content promotion strategies.     Monitor and analyze website performance using SEO tools and web analytics platforms to track keyword rankings, organic traffic, and user engagement metrics.     Conduct competitive analysis to identify opportunities, industry trends, and best practices.     Provide strategic recommendations for website architecture, content optimization, and conversion rate optimization.     Stay up to date with the latest SEO trends, algorithm changes, and industry developments, and implement them into strategies and campaigns.     Lead SEO projects and collaborate with cross-functional teams, including content creators, web developers, and marketing managers.     Prepare comprehensive SEO performance reports and present key findings, insights, and recommendations to stakeholders.         Requirements:         Bachelors degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is preferred.     Proven track record of 1-3 years in planning and executing successful SEO campaigns, resulting in improved organic rankings and traffic.     Expert-level knowledge of SEO principles, techniques, and best practices.     Proficiency in using advanced SEO tools and platforms, such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Ahrefs, SEMrush, or similar tools.     Strong technical SEO skills, including website crawling, indexing, XML sitemaps, robots.txt, and schema markup.     Experience in conducting advanced SEO audits and implementing technical recommendations.     Advanced understanding of link building strategies, outreach techniques, and content promotion.     Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, analyze trends, and make data-driven decisions.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.     Strong project management skills and the ability to prioritize and manage multiple SEO projects simultaneously.     Experience with e-commerce SEO and knowledge of SEO for various content management systems (CMS) is a plus

The offered salary package is at par with industry standards.          SEO Job In Noida Some key details:          SEO and SMO roles involve activities like keyword research, on-page optimization, link building, social media marketing, and tracking performance.          Popular skills required include knowledge of search engine algorithms, experience with analytics tools, social media expertise, creativity, and project management abilities.          Many multinational companies are hiring for these positions to handle international campaigns. Top companies hiring include startups, digital marketing agencies, ecommerce portals, and IT consulting firms.          The article advises that those looking to apply should update their resumes, prepare for interviews, increase their personal branding online, and leverage professional contacts and networks.          In summary, the article discusses the current demand for SEO and SMO specialists in Noida due to it being an IT/software hub, outlines key skills and activities for these roles, and provides tips for candidates looking to land relevant jobs there.              Boosting a website s visibility on Google is called SEO. Search engine optimization is the process of making your website more friendly to search engines.          Search engine optimization involves finding popular keywords and using them in your website s content.          Content Quality and Relevance: Your website should contain useful and search engine-friendly content.          A well-structured, search engine-friendly website, complete with a clean layout, fast loading, and no broken links, is also essential for SEO.          Having links from other websites shows search engines that your site has high authority.          The use of local SEO helps local traffic          Staying Updated: As search engines change how they rank websites, you must continually study and update your SEO strategy

column2: The Manager, Offsite SEO is responsible for leading a team of link builders to successfully establish relationships and earn high-quality links from other relevant domains across the internet in a predictable and sustainable manner. This is a people management role with high expectations of communication, project management, and technical skills. The ideal candidate has a strong understanding of scaled email communication, relationship building, and coaching a team on high-volume low success rate campaigns. Experience with offsite SEO, link building, and digital PR, are major pluses, but not required. This role is located in Bengaluru. column2: Role & responsibilities     Completely own the SEO business at the agency including client relations, project management, team management and delivering results. Lead a SEO team (current team strength of 15+, including managers, associates etc, growing to 25+ in 6 months). Lead client projects end to end via the team. Create pitches for new clients basis their briefs and pitching strategic solutions them. Capability building of the team across all facets. Improve delivery processes and systems to keep building the business. Create and launch new business solutions in the SEO and allied spaces, by working closely with the BD team, Web team and founders Preferred candidate profile     3-5 years of relevant experience of the White Hat SEO process in Agencies. Must have led a team of SEOs before. Strong analytical skills and strategic thinking ability. Should be able to lead multiple SEO projects simultaneously. Should have experience in eCommerce as well as non-eCommerce projects. Solid SEO skill sets and very results driven mindset. Super keen to grow the business together with the founders. Excellent written and verbal communication skills (email, phone, etc.). Should be extremely focused on delivering results for clients. Benefits     Why you should join us? In case you value the opportunity to work on real & challenging Marketing problems. In case you value high involvement from founders and learning from them. In case you value having the autonomy to do things your way and not have to worry about experimental failures. In case you care about working alongside genuine, honest peers who will have your back, no matter what. In case you value contributing to the organization beyond your call of duty; and getting handsomely remunerated for the extra effort. In case you believe in always learning and want an environment which will invest into your learning for the long term In case you want to work on the cutting edge of marketing problems and use the most cutting tools and strategies. In case you are looking for a place for the long term where you can keep growing with the company (our first few hires from 5-6 years back, are still with the company) Why you shouldn't join us? In case you are looking for a product company, of course we aren't one. In case you are looking for a very very structured corporate environment where everyone is extremely clear on their role and ONLY has to do that. We thrive as a bootstrapped company and hence like to be nimble about changes and whatever is needed to be done to get ahead. In case you are looking for the top bracket pay in the industry - we are not the one for you. You may find hyper funded startups who can do that for you. Working Days: Monday to Friday (Onsite) + Saturday Half Day (WFH) Location: HSR Layout, Bangalore.

column2: Innovapptive has been growing rapidly as our Connected Worker Platform becomes the software of choice for industrial companies across the globe        We are now ready to double down and hit the accelerate button and increase our market penetration      We are looking for a SEO Analyst to join our expanding Demand Generation team      This role will report directly to the Manager Digital Marketing and will work closely with other members of the Marketing team      The SEO Analyst will work collaboratively to manage and support all search engine optimization and social media activities      This role includes overseeing and supporting various SEO initiatives aimed at enhancing rankings across major search networks with the ultimate goal of maximizing ROI                             How You Will Make an Impact:                                  Keyword Research: Conduct comprehensive keyword research to identify high-potential opportunities for improving search engine rankings and organic traffic.                              On-Page SEO: Optimize website content, meta tags, headings, and other on-page elements for maximum search engine visibility.                              Off-Page SEO: Develop and implement off-page SEO strategies, including effective link building, to augment our websites authority and reputation.                              Technical SEO: Collaborate with the web development team to identify and resolve technical SEO issues (including site speed, mobile optimization, and structured data markup etc.), ensuring optimal website performance.                              Analytics/Tools: Proficient in MS Clarity, Search Console & Google Analytics4, I identify website optimization opportunities and deliver actionable SEO insights for continuous growth.                              SEO Reporting: Produce regular reports to monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of SEO strategies, providing data-driven recommendations for continuous enhancement.                              Competitor Analysis: Stay abreast of industry trends and competitor strategies, adapting and optimizing our SEO efforts accordingly.                              Automation: Proficient in leveraging HubSpots SEO tools for keyword management, ranking tracking, and content optimization, while using HubSpots analytics to gain insights into organic traffic and collaborating with teams to integrate SEO best practices into marketing initiatives.                                  What You Bring to the Team:                                  Ideal Candidate:                                  The ideal candidate is a highly energetic, passionate, and purpose-driven executive that wants to make a significant impact on the world. The ideal candidate will work in a fast-paced, dynamic, and data-driven organization and is obsessed with search engine optimization.                                  Minimum 3 to 5 years of experience in SEO with a demonstrably successful track record of improving organic traffic and search engine rankings.                              Strong understanding of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and key SEO tools.                              Excellent analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to make informed recommendations.                              Proficient in content creation, with the ability to write engaging and SEO-optimized copy for both website and social media.                              Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.                              Passion for learning and staying up-to-date with the latest SEO and social media trends and techniques. column2: READ THROUGH THE JOB DESCRIPTION VERY CAREFULLY AND ONLY APPLY IF YOU POSSES REQUIRED SKILLS. Google and Bing Indexation Specialist is responsible for ensuring that web content is effectively crawled, indexed, and ranked on search engine result pages (SERPs) for Google and Bing. The role involves implementing strategies to optimize website visibility and enhance organic search perform.   Engine Indexation Management: Monitor and manage the indexing status of websites on Google and Bing search engines. Implement strategies to ensure efficient and optimal indexation of website content. XML Sitemap Management: Create and optimize XML sitemaps to facilitate search engine crawling and indexing. Regularly update and submit XML sitemaps to search engines. Crawling and Rendering Analysis: Conduct analysis of website crawling and rendering behavior on search engines. Identify and resolve issues that may impact indexation, such as crawl errors or rendering problems. Canonicalization and URL Structure: Implement and maintain proper canonicalization to avoid duplicate content issues. Optimize URL structures for search engine visibility and user experience. Robots.txt Management: Configure and manage the robots.txt file to control search engine crawling behavior. Ensure that important pages are accessible to search engine bots. Indexation Audits: Perform regular audits to identify and rectify indexation issues. Collaborate with web developers and content creators to address and fix problems. Algorithm Updates Awareness: Stay informed about search engine algorithm updates and their potential impact on indexation. Adjust strategies to align with best practices and algorithm changes. Keyword Research and Optimization: Work with SEO teams to optimize content for relevant keywords. Ensure that indexed pages align with targeted search queries. Monitoring and Reporting: Use web analytics tools to monitor indexation performance and user behavior. Prepare and present reports on indexation metrics and improvements. Collaboration: Collaborate with other SEO specialists, web developers, and content creators to achieve overall search engine optimization goals. XML Sitemap Ping: Set up automatic ping notifications to search engines when a new XML sitemap is generated. This signals search engines to crawl the sitemap promptly, leading to faster indexation. Submit URL Requests: Use search engine webmaster tools to submit individual URLs for immediate indexing. This can be particularly useful for time-sensitive content. Priority Tagging in XML Sitemaps: Prioritize important URLs by using the "priority" tag in XML sitemaps. This signals to search engines the relative importance of each URL for faster crawling. Fetch as Google/Bing: Utilize the "Fetch as Google" or equivalent feature in webmaster tools to request immediate crawling of specific pages. This is beneficial for urgent updates or new content. Optimize Website Performance: Ensure that the website loads quickly and efficiently. Fast-loading pages are more likely to be crawled frequently. Use of Pub/Sub Mechanisms: Implement publish-subscribe mechanisms to notify search engines of content changes. This can include integrating with systems like Google's Pub/Sub for real-time notifications. Dynamic XML Sitemaps: Generate XML sitemaps dynamically based on content changes. This ensures that search engines receive updated sitemaps without manual intervention. Structured Data Markup: Implement structured data markup (Schema.org) to provide clear signals to search engines about the content and its context. Rich snippets may encourage faster indexing. Social Media Signals: Leverage social media platforms to share and promote new content. Social signals can contribute to faster discovery and indexing by search engines. Regular Content Updates: Maintain a content publication schedule to signal to search engines that the website is actively updated. Regularly updating content encourages search engines to crawl the site more frequently. Optimize Crawl Budget: Focus on optimizing crawl budget by ensuring search engines spend more time crawling important and updated content. This involves minimizing crawl errors and directing bots to high-priority pages. Custom Crawl Scripts: Develop custom Python scripts to perform targeted and efficient crawling of specific sections of the website. This allows for a more focused approach, ensuring that important pages are crawled promptly. Dynamic XML Sitemap Generation: Create Python scripts that dynamically generate XML sitemaps based on changes in the website's content. Automation ensures that search engines receive updated sitemaps without manual intervention. Search Engine API Integration: Utilize Python libraries to integrate with search engine APIs (e.g., Google Search Console API, Bing Webmaster API). Automate tasks such as submitting URLs for indexing and fetching crawl statistics. Headless Browsing with Selenium: Use Selenium, a Python library, for headless browsing to simulate user interactions with web pages. This can be helpful for rendering JavaScript-driven content, ensuring it is properly indexed. Asynchronous Crawling with asyncio: Implement asynchronous crawling using Python's asyncio library. Asynchronous requests can speed up the crawling process by allowing multiple requests to be handled simultaneously. Machine Learning for Content Prioritization: Implement machine learning algorithms to analyze content changes and predict the importance of specific pages. Prioritize crawling based on the predicted importance for faster indexation. Natural Language Processing (NLP): Use NLP techniques to analyze and understand the context of content changes. This can help in providing more context to search engines for improved indexing. Integration with Content Management Systems (CMS): Develop Python scripts to integrate with the website's CMS to trigger indexation when content is updated. This ensures that search engines are promptly notified of changes. Automated Canonicalization Checks: Develop scripts to automatically check and enforce proper canonicalization rules. Python can be used to identify and address canonicalization issues that may impact indexation. Custom Crawling Policies: Implement Python scripts to define custom crawling policies based on the website's unique characteristics. This allows for fine-tuning the crawling process for optimal indexation. Monitoring and Alerts: Develop Python scripts for real-time monitoring of indexation metrics. Set up alerts to notify when there are deviations from expected indexation patterns. Qualifications: Strong understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factors. Experience with SEO tools and web analytics. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Effective communication and collaboration skills. Advance skills in Python for SEO and Indexation.

column2: Best Mobile App Development Company in Mohali India Skills Required Content writing,  Grammatical good,  having knowledge about SMM, Conversion Rate Optimization -  CRO     The Internet of Things is making its way into our everyday life,  whether we notice it or not. Smart City deployments and solutions make up one of the largest IoT markets in the world. These applications are developed to increase citizen safety,  save government money,  reduce environment footprint and more. Here is a list of some of the top Smart City solutions.     Smart Parking Smart Parking is perhaps the most adopted IoT smart city solution of all. Major cities around the world are incorporating sensors and devices that count the number of cars in a lot,  notify for open spaces and even notify users when their parking time has expired. There are many smart parking benefits that will help transform a city into a smart city.      Waste Management The amount of trash is globally increasing at a very high rate. Cities will be forced to become smarter by integrating automation solutions that manage this increase in waste. This is being done by efforts such as smart trash sorting,  truck optimization and even underground pipes collecting household garbage.      Smart Street Lighting Every city of lights has an extensive process to managing light posts,  traffic lights and any city- owned device with a bulb. By capturing and automating smart city data correctly,  this maintenance need could be reduced to a streamlined process from monitoring and notifying to instillation and restocking.      Water Management Cities must manage their drinking water to ensure that citizens have enough to safely consume. Smart city water management can include optimized contamination monitoring,  leak detection,  quality control,  maintenance and more.      Smart Surveillance Safety is key in major cities that experience crime in numbers. IoT physical security can include intelligent monitoring,  tampering alerts,  perimeter protection,  facial recognition and automobile tracking.      Smart Buildings The Internet of Things is also changing building management throughout cities by introducing smart building devices and solutions. Office building managers can save money and provide better service to tenants by incorporating systems like remote monitoring,  smart landscaping,  IoT physical security and appliance maintenance. column2: About the Role: In this  contract,   remote  position, you will play a crucial role in developing and executing effective link-building strategies to improve the search engine rankings and online visibility of our clients' websites. You will be responsible for managing multiple client accounts, identifying and securing high-quality backlinks through various tactics, and staying up-to-date on the latest industry trends and best practices. Responsibilities: Develop and implement comprehensive link-building strategies for assigned clients. Conduct thorough competitor link analysis to identify opportunities and track progress. Secure high-quality backlinks through various methods, including guest posting, broken link building, and content creation. Maintain strong relationships with website owners and influencers through effective outreach and communication. Monitor link performance and track results using industry-standard tools. Stay current on the latest SEO and link-building trends and best practices. Qualifications : Minimum 4 years of experience in SEO, with a strong focus on link building. Proven track record of successfully building high-quality backlinks for clients. Excellent communication and outreach skills, with the ability to build and maintain positive relationships. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Proficiency in SEO tools and link-building techniques. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Benefits : Competitive salary range of Rs. 20,000 to Rs. 30,000 per month, its paid on a task wise. Performance-based incentives. Remote work environment with flexible hours. Opportunity to work with a talented and experienced team in a fast-paced environment. To Apply: Please submit your resume and cover letter to info at timeagencygroup.com Additional Information: This position requires a 9-hour daily shift from Monday to Friday, with weekends off. Work will be managed using Google Sheets, Trello, and other relevant tools. You will need to provide your own computer and a reliable internet connection (fiber-optic preferred). This is a part time job and you need to work in the evening and weekends. You can continue to work on your full time job and do this part time. This is independent job position and you are expected to work on your own and all the details needed to perform job will be provided.

column2: We are looking for a skilled and motivated SEO Specialist with minimum 3+ years of experience in Search Engine Optimization. As an SEO Specialist, you will play a crucial role in driving organic traffic, improving search rankings, and optimizing website performance. This is a full-time position, and the candidate should be able to work from the office and join within 15 days of the offer acceptance.   Role & responsibilities: Implement and execute effective SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and increase website visibility. Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and on-page/off-page optimization to enhance website performance. Generate and analyze website performance reports using tools like Google Analytics and Search Console. Collaborate with content creators and web developers to ensure SEO best practices are followed in all online content and website updates. Stay updated with industry trends and search engine algorithm changes to adapt strategies accordingly. Monitor and report on key SEO metrics, including traffic, rankings, and conversion rates, and provide actionable insights. Preferred candidate profile: 2 to 3 years of hands-on experience in SEO and experience working in Wordpress with a track record of improving organic search rankings. Strong understanding of keyword research, on-page/off-page optimization, and technical SEO. Proficiency in using SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Search Console, and keyword research tools. Excellent analytical skills and ability to draw insights from data. Effective communication and teamwork skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams. Full-time work from the office, and able to join within 15 days.

column2: Job Summary:  We are looking for a seasoned Head of SEO Strategy to lead our search engine optimization efforts across all facets including on-page, off-page, and technical SEO. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of scaling organic growth, managing budgets, and forecasting revenues. As a leader, you will build and mentor a high-performing SEO team, driving our company to the forefront of organic search visibility.  Location:  Bangalore Department:  Marketing Reports to:   Chief Marketing Officer Full-Time Job Type:  Full-Time Experience:   5-10 Years  Key Responsibilities:  Strategy Development:  Create and implement a comprehensive SEO strategy that aligns with our business goals, focusing on improving our website's visibility and organic search rankings.  Team Leadership:  Build, manage, and mentor an SEO team divided into on-page, off-page, and technical SEO, ensuring high performance and continuous development.  Performance Analysis:  Conduct regular SEO audits, monitor website performance, and adjust strategies based on analytics and search engine updates. Budget Management:  Manage the SEO budget efficiently, allocate resources wisely, and forecast future needs to ensure optimal ROI. Revenue Forecasting:  Work closely with the finance and marketing teams to forecast SEO-driven revenues, contributing to the companys financial planning. Cross-functional Collaboration:  Collaborate with content, design, and development teams to ensure SEO best practices are integrated into all facets of our web presence.  Innovation:  Stay ahead of SEO trends and competitor strategies to identify new opportunities for growth and improvement.  Reporting:  Provide regular updates to senior management on the progress, performance, and ROI of SEO initiatives.? Key Skills:  Leadership:  Strong leadership and team-building skills, with the ability to inspire, motivate, and mentor team members. SEO Expertise:  In-depth knowledge of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO. Familiarity with SEO tools (e.g., SEMrush, Ahrefs, Moz) and web analytics (e.g., Google Analytics, Webmaster Tools). Strategic Thinking:  Ability to develop strategic plans based on data analysis and business goals. Analytical Skills:  Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions. Communication:  Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to clearly articulate SEO strategies and results to stakeholders. Budget Management:  Experience managing budgets and forecasting revenues in a digital marketing context. Adaptability:  Ability to adapt to changing SEO landscapes and algorithm updates.? Qualifications:  5-10 years of experience in SEO, with a minimum of 3 years in a leadership role. Proven track record of successfully managing and scaling an SEO team. Demonstrable experience in developing and implementing effective SEO strategies. Strong understanding of the digital marketing ecosystem and how SEO fits within it.? Websites:  https://quantumleap.co.in  https://rajivtalreja.com  https://karanhasija.com?

column2: The SEO specialist role supports the conceptualization, design and delivery of SEO for clients to ensure top ranking in search engines:   1. Keyword research in coordination with objectives to optimize existing content and uncover new opportunities.   2. SEO analysis and recommendations in coordination with elements and structure of websites and web pages.    3. Provide recommendations and execute strategies for content development in coordination with SEO goals.   4. Administer search engine programs (XML sitemaps, shopping feeds, webmaster tools) for diagnostic reporting.             5   . Implement link building campaigns in coordination with client SEO goals. Assist in the development and execution of communication/content strategies via social communities in coordination with SEO goals.   6. Keep pace with SEO, search engine, social media and internet marketing industry trends and developments.    7. Monitor and administer web analytics dashboards, reports and key reporting tools, and point out key areas of importance in accordance with client goals. Monitor and evaluate search results and search performance   8. Work closely with the other team members to meet client goals. Evaluate the effectiveness of all online marketing programs, draw conclusions and develop recommendations based on results on a timely basis.       Requirements       1. 1-3 years experience in Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and/or Social Media Marketing.   2. Proficiency in MS Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.   3. Experience with On page, Off Page, blog post, website analysis using a variety of analytics tools including Google Analytics as well as an internal reporting tool.   4. Experience working with popular keyword tools.   5. Experience working with CMS and building/administering content in CMS environments.   6. Ability to manage full-fledged SEO campaigns, Website analysis, On-page optimization System Optimization.   7. Must be passionate about search engine optimization, web technologies trends. Skilled in Internet Marketing.   8. Must be able to interact with team members and clients alike to achieve desired results.         9. Knowledge of HTML/CSS and website administrations (good to have).         10. 2-3 years work experience with any other SEO company in Mumbai

column2: As an SEO Specialist, you will play a pivotal role within the digital marketing team, focusing on enhancing and optimizing our companys and clients online presence in search engine results     This multifaceted position calls for a combination of technical prowess, analytical acumen, and creative thinking to drive organic traffic, boost search engine rankings, and elevate overall online visibility     We are in search of talented    SEO Experts Specialist    who can devise and execute strategic plans for both online and offline SEO, ensuring our company and clients consistently secure leading positions in the digital landscape     A solid understanding of keyword research and its impact on ranking is vital     Our ideal candidate will possess the know-how to conduct thorough competitor research to gain a competitive edge     By employing effective strategies, they will aim to improve the visibility of keywords, products, and services     The role also entails proficient website analytics to identify areas for improvement, ensuring website pages are optimized for maximum impact     Furthermore, a key aspect of this position is to align our growth with that of our clients, promoting mutual success and satisfaction     We are seeking a warrior SEO specialist who not only contributes significantly to their own professional growth but also acts as a valuable asset to both our company and our esteemed clientele     Being dynamic, intelligent, and well-versed in the ever-evolving digital landscape is a must           If you possess the capabilities to elevate    SEO rankings    in a distinctive and exceptional manner, we invite you to apply and join our vibrant team at Moris Media.             Develop and implement effective SEO strategies to increase organic traffic and enhance visibility on search engines.     Perform comprehensive keyword research and analysis to identify target keywords and optimize website content accordingly.     Execute on-page optimization tasks, including optimizing meta tags, headers, and URL structures to improve website ranking and user experience.     Optimize website architecture and navigation to facilitate search engine crawling and indexing.     Utilize SEO tools and web analytics platforms to regularly monitor and analyze website performance.     Identify and resolve technical SEO issues, such as crawl errors, broken links, and duplicate content.     Collaborate with content creators to ensure SEO-friendly content creation and optimization.     Stay informed about industry trends and algorithm updates to continually improve SEO strategies.     Conduct regular competitor analysis to identify opportunities for improvement and maintain a competitive edge.     Provide SEO recommendations and guidance to cross-functional teams, including web developers, designers, and marketers.     Prepare regular SEO reports and performance metrics to track progress and communicate results to stakeholders.     Execute tests, collect and analyze data and results, and identify trends and insights to maximize ROI in paid search campaigns.     Track, report, and analyze website analytics and PPC initiatives and campaigns.     Manage campaign expenses, adhere to budgets, estimate monthly costs, and reconcile discrepancies.     Optimize copy and landing pages for search engine marketing.     Perform ongoing keyword discovery, expansion, and optimization.     Research and implement search engine optimization recommendations.     Analyze competitor advertising links and develop link building strategies.     Collaborate with the development team to ensure SEO best practices are properly implemented on newly developed code.     Work with editorial and marketing teams to drive SEO in content creation and content programming.     Recommend changes to website architecture, content, linking, and other factors to enhance SEO positions for target keywords.                 Bachelors degree in digital marketing or a related subject.     Demonstrated hands-on experience of at least 2-5 years in Search Engine Optimization.     Proficient written and verbal communication skills with strong IT fluency.     Essential knowledge of Google Analytics to analyze and optimize website performance.     Familiarity with JavaScript or HTML, providing an advantage in implementing technical SEO strategies.     Excellent organizational skills, enabling efficient management of multiple tasks and projects.     Proven track record of successfully acquiring, delivering, and maintaining key client relationships.         MANDATORY REQUISITES         Moris works in a Hybrid mode and hence this work-from-home job will require:     Laptop/desktop with upgraded configurations     High-speed internet connection for seamless navigation.     Excellent oral and written communication skills.     The job might involve occasional outdoor travel, the candidate needs to be flexible to travel, whenever required.     Must have Telephonic Skills as the position requires a considerable amount of work on the phone with clients.     Must have excellent Management skills and be willing to work under pressure and on a targeted basis.     Should be patient, career-oriented, and diplomatic.

column2: Company Overview: Timestamp Technologies is a dynamic and rapidly growing IT company committed to delivering innovative solutions to our clients. We pride ourselves on fostering a collaborative and forward-thinking work environment, and we are currently seeking a talented Senior SEO Executive to join our team. Position Overview: As a Senior SEO Executive, you will play a crucial role in driving organic traffic, improving search engine rankings, and optimizing our online presence. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of successfully implementing SEO strategies, staying abreast of industry trends, and demonstrating a strong analytical mindset. Eligibility Criteria: Bachelor's degree in any technical course such as B.E/B.Tech, MCA, MBA, BCA, or similar. Freshers with valid training certificates or knowledge about SEO are welcome. Basic understanding of HTML, CSS, website development and link-building strategy is required. In-depth knowledge of SEO best practices, algorithms, and ranking factors. Experience with SEO tools such as SEMrush, Moz, Google Analytics, and Google Search Console. Role Responsibilities: Develop and execute effective SEO strategies to enhance online visibility. Conduct comprehensive keyword research to uncover growth opportunities. Implement on-page and off-page optimization techniques for maximum impact. Perform technical SEO audits and collaborate on-site enhancements. Optimize content to improve search engine rankings and enhance user experience. Monitor SEO metrics, track rankings, and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement. Perks: Competitive salary ranging from 15,000 to 25,000, based on experience and expertise. Flexible work hours - work anytime, anywhere, but daily reporting is required before midnight. Six-day work format. Fully remote job - work from the comfort of your home. How to Apply: If you are a results-driven SEO professional looking to take your career to the next level, please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant work samples to us. In your cover letter, highlight your key achievements and how your skills align with the responsibilities outlined in this job description. Timestamp is an equal-opportunity employer. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply. Note: This is a fulltime job Dont apply if you can't manage 6-8 hrs a day.

column2: Position Overview:* We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented SEO Specialist to join our digital marketing team. The ideal candidate has a deep understanding of search engine optimization strategies, algorithms, and best practices. As an SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for driving organic traffic, improving search engine rankings, and enhancing the online visibility of our website and content. Location: Bhayander Contact no:9109984646  Urgent opening for SEO Executive In Bhayander West. *Key Responsibilities:* 1. *SEO Strategy and Planning:*    - Develop and execute effective SEO strategies tailored to our business goals and target audience.    - Conduct thorough keyword research to identify high-potential keywords and phrases.   2. *On-Page Optimization:*    - Optimize website content, meta tags, headings, images, and URLs for improved search engine visibility.    - Implement internal linking strategies to enhance user experience and search engine crawling.   3. *Technical SEO:*    - Monitor and improve website architecture, speed, mobile responsiveness, and crawlability.    - Identify and resolve technical issues that could impact search engine rankings.   4. *Off-Page Optimization:*    - Plan and execute link building strategies to earn high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites.    - Monitor and manage the link profile to ensure quality and relevance.   5. *Content Optimization:*    - Collaborate with content creators to ensure new content aligns with SEO best practices.    - Optimize existing content for target keywords and user intent.   6. *Competitor Analysis:*    - Research and analyze competitor SEO strategies and identify opportunities for improvement.   7. *Analytics and Reporting:*    - Monitor and analyze website traffic, user behavior, and key performance metrics.    - Provide regular reports on SEO performance and insights to stakeholders.   8. *Stay Abreast of Industry Trends:*    - Stay updated on search engine algorithm changes, industry trends, and best practices.    - Implement new strategies and techniques to maintain a competitive edge.
column11: SEO, Search Engine Optimization, Keyword Analysis, Off-page Optimization, On-page Optimization

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced SEO & Performance Marketing Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about digital marketing, with a strong understanding of SEO best practices and proven experience in performance marketing channels.  Role & responsibilities     SEO Strategy Development:  Develop and implement comprehensive SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings, increase website traffic, and drive conversions. Keyword Research & Analysis:  Conduct thorough keyword research to identify high-value target keywords and optimize website content accordingly. On-Page & Off-Page Optimization:  Optimize website content, meta tags, and other on-page elements to improve search engine visibility. Execute off-page optimization strategies such as link building to enhance domain authority. Technical SEO:  Monitor website performance, identify technical issues affecting SEO, and collaborate with the development team to implement solutions. Content Marketing:  Collaborate with the content team to create SEO-friendly content that resonates with our target audience and drives organic traffic. Performance Marketing Campaigns:  Plan, execute, and optimize performance marketing campaigns across various channels such as PPC, display advertising, social media advertising, and email marketing. Analytics & Reporting:  Monitor campaign performance, analyze key metrics, and provide regular reports to track progress and identify opportunities for optimization. Competitor Analysis:  Keep abreast of industry trends and competitor activities to identify opportunities and challenges in the market. Preferred candidate profile     Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. Proven experience in SEO and performance marketing, with a strong track record of driving results. column2: Job description   We own and manage two large travel portals selling online holiday packages to domestic and international tourists. Over the years, our websites have enjoyed leadership positions in the domestic and international holiday booking segment through organic traffic from search engines. The websites have extensive destination-based & a blog that is updated regularly by our existing team of Content writers, SEOs and web development team. With the reopening of the travel market after the pandemic, we are strengthening our online marketing efforts and looking to add additional SEO resources to our current team. The job will require you to do qualitative on-page & off-page SEO updates of the sections assigned and help grow the existing online presence of the websites. Roles and Responsibilities   Reviewing, creating and executing ongoing on-page & off-page analysis of the website based on destinations & market segment. Doing keyword research to strengthen the website ranking on the existing keywords and acquiring new keywords. Focus on growing mobile-based search traffic to the website Enhancing the existing backlink profile of the website. Participating in content generation ideas with the content development team Doing fundamental website housekeeping activities like GSC cleanup and other regular SEO related site maintenance activities. Candidate Profile:   You should have a clear understanding of SEO fundamentals and best practices. Experience in executing backlink building strategies is an essential requirement in a suitable candidate profile. Experience in the travel industry will be an added advantage. Basic knowledge about HTML CSS would be an advantage. Good written and verbal communication skills in the English language.

column2: Role & responsibilities   We are seeking a talented and experienced Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, implementing, and managing digital marketing campaigns that promote our brand, products, and services. This role requires a deep understanding of digital marketing channels, including social media, email marketing, SEO, SEM, and content marketing. The Digital Marketing Specialist will work closely with cross-functional teams to drive engagement, generate leads, and increase conversion rates. Responsibilities:  Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with business goals.  Oversee the execution of digital marketing campaigns across various channels.  Analyze data and metrics to track campaign performance and make data-driven decisions.  Stay updated on digital marketing trends and technologies. SEO (ON page & OFF Page):  Conduct keyword research and analysis.  Optimize website content and structure for search engines.  Develop and implement link-building strategies.  Monitor and report on website traffic and search engine rankings.  Stay updated on SEO best practices and algorithm changes. PPC (Pay-Per-Click):  Create and manage PPC campaigns on platforms like Google Ads, Meta Ads, etc.  Conduct keyword research and ad targeting.  Monitor campaign performance and adjust bids and budgets as needed.  Analyze and report on campaign metrics, such as click-through rate (CTR) and conversion rate. Content Marketing:  Create and manage content calendars for various digital channels.  Develop high-quality and engaging content for websites, blogs, social media, email newsletters, etc.  Optimize content for search engines (SEO) and user engagement.  Analyze content performance and adjust strategies accordingly. Social Media Marketing:  Develop and implement social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement.  Manage social media accounts and communities.  Create and curate content for social media platforms.  Monitor social media conversations and respond to inquiries or comments.  Analyze social media metrics and insights to optimize performance. Email Marketing:  Develop and execute email marketing campaigns.  Create email templates and content.  Segment email lists and personalizes campaigns.  Monitor email deliverability and performance metrics.  A/B test email campaigns to optimize results. Analytics:  Set up and maintain digital analytics tools, such as Google Analytics.  Create custom reports and dashboards to track key performance indicators (KPIs).  Analyze website and campaign data to identify trends and insights.  Provide recommendations for improving digital marketing performance based on data analysis. Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO):  Identify opportunities to improve website conversion rates.  Conduct A/B tests and multivariate tests to optimize website elements (e.g., landing pages, CTAs).  Analyze user behaviour and website usability to identify barriers to conversion.  Implement changes based on test results to improve conversion rates. Preferred candidate profile   Qualifications:  Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field.  Proven experience in digital marketing, with a strong track record in on page and off page optimization.  Certification in Digital Marketing  Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Perks and benefits

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior SEO Executive to join our dynamic digital marketing team        The ideal candidate will be responsible for enhancing our websites visibility in search engines, driving organic traffic, and improving user engagement through strategic SEO initiatives      This role demands someone who can blend technical SEO know-how with a creative approach to content optimization, someone who is not only data-driven but also possesses the ability to foresee SEO trends and pivot strategies accordingly                   Key Responsibilities:          Comprehensive Keyword Research    : Identify high-value search terms and phrases relevant to our target audiences to shape content strategy and optimization efforts.      Website Content Optimization    : Enhance landing pages, blog posts, and product pages for search engine visibility and user experience, ensuring that our content meets the highest standards of relevance and engagement.      On-Page Optimization Tasks    : Conduct meta tag optimization, URL structuring, and internal linking to improve our websites ranking and indexing on search engines.      Off-Page SEO Strategies    : Develop and implement robust backlink strategies to elevate the domains authority and online presence across different platforms.      Performance Monitoring    : Use industry-standard SEO tools (Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Ahrefs, SEMrush) to track keyword rankings, monitor organic traffic flows, and analyze conversion metrics, turning data into actionable insights.      Technical SEO    : Collaborate with the web development team to identify and solve technical SEO issues, ensuring the website is optimized for crawling and indexing.      Trend Analysis    : Keep abreast of the latest trends in search engine algorithms, SEO best practices, and digital marketing techniques, applying this knowledge to refine and adapt our SEO strategy continuously.      Cross-Functional Collaboration    : Work closely with content creators, designers, and developers to ensure SEO strategies are integrated seamlessly with content and design initiatives.      Reporting and Analysis    : Prepare detailed reports and presentations on SEO performance, providing clear insights, successes, challenges, and strategic recommendations for continuous improvement to stakeholders.                Requirements          SEO Experience    : Minimum 3-5 years of proven experience in SEO, digital marketing, or a related field, with a solid portfolio of successful SEO campaigns.      Technical Proficiency    : Strong command over SEO tools (Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs) and knowledge of search engine algorithms and ranking factors.      Analytical    : Exceptional analytical skills with a knack for data analysis and making data-driven decisions.      Communication Skills    : Excellent written and verbal communication abilities, capable of crafting clear SEO strategies and presenting data and insights effectively.      Teamwork    : Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, driving projects to completion while being an integral part of a team.        Adaptability    : A quick learner who can stay ahead of SEO trends and adapt strategies to meet the evolving digital landscape.

column2: Job Title:  SEO Executive Job Location:  Agra Job Type:  Full-time Experience Level:  Mid to Senior-level (3-8 years) Job Description: We are looking for a talented and experienced SEO Executive to join our digital marketing team. As an SEO Executive, you will play a key role in developing and implementing effective SEO strategies to improve our online presence, drive organic traffic, and enhance the overall performance of our digital assets. Roles and Responsibilities: 1.   Keyword Research and Analysis: Conduct comprehensive keyword research to identify relevant and high-performing keywords. Analyze competitor keyword strategies and identify opportunities for improvement. 2.   On-Page Optimization: Optimize website content, meta tags, URLs, and other on-page elements for improved search engine visibility. Implement best practices for on-page SEO to enhance user experience. 3.   Technical SEO Audits: Perform technical SEO audits to identify and address issues affecting website performance. Collaborate with the development team to implement technical SEO recommendations. 4.   Link Building: Develop and execute effective link-building strategies to improve the website's authority. Build relationships with relevant websites and influencers for link-building opportunities. 5.   Content Optimization: Collaborate with content creators to ensure content is optimized for search engines. Optimize existing content and identify opportunities for new, SEO-friendly content. 6.   Monitoring and Reporting: Use SEO tools to monitor website performance, track keyword rankings, and analyze backlink profiles. Prepare regular reports on SEO performance, providing actionable insights. 7.   Stay Updated on Industry Trends: Keep abreast of industry trends, algorithm updates, and emerging SEO best practices. Proactively implement strategies to align with changing search engine algorithms. Qualifications and Skills: 1.   Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Digital Marketing, or a related field. 2.   Experience: 3-8 years of hands-on experience in Search Engine Optimization. 3.   Technical Proficiency: Proficient in using SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, etc. Understanding of web development technologies and their impact on SEO. 4 .  Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to interpret data and make data-driven decisions. Ability to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement. 5.   Communication Skills: Effective verbal and written communication skills. Ability to explain complex SEO concepts to non-technical stakeholders. 6 .  Adaptability: Ability to adapt to evolving search engine algorithms and industry trends. Commitment to continuous learning and staying updated on SEO best practices. Key Result Areas (KRAs): Keyword Research and Analysis. Conduct thorough keyword research to identify relevant and high-traffic keywords. Analyze keyword competitiveness and trends to optimize website content. On-Page Optimization: Implement on-page SEO strategies, including meta tags, header tags, and URL optimization. Optimize content for readability, relevance, and keyword density. Off-Page Optimization: Develop and execute link-building strategies to increase the website's authority. Engage in outreach activities to secure backlinks from authoritative       websites. Content Creation and Optimization: Create SEO-friendly content, including blog posts,       articles, and website copy. Optimize existing content for search engine visibility and user experience. Technical SEO: Conduct website audits to identify and resolve technical issues affecting SEO. Ensure proper implementation of SEO best practices, including sitemaps and       robots.txt. SEO Analytics and Reporting: Monitor website performance using tools like Google Analytics and Search Console. Generate regular reports on key SEO metrics and provide insights for improvement. Competitor Analysis: Conduct competitive analysis to identify opportunities and threats in the industry. Stay updated on industry trends and algorithm changes to adjust strategies accordingly. Local SEO: Optimize the website for local search, including Google My Business optimization. Manage local citations and online reviews to enhance local visibility. Social Media Integration: Integrate SEO strategies with social media channels to amplify online presence. Collaborate with social media teams for cohesive digital marketing efforts. Continuous Learning: Stay informed about the latest trends, tools, and technologies in SEO. Attend relevant webinars, conferences, and training sessions to enhance skills. Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): Collaborate with the marketing team to improve the website's conversion rates. Analyze user behavior and suggest changes to enhance the user journey. Interested candidates can share their resume at  recruitment@oswaalbooks.com / hrlead@oswaalbooks.com

column2: Job Description: As an SEO Executive focused on lead generation and conversion, you will play a vital role in driving qualified leads to our website and maximizing online sales through effective conversion optimization strategies. Key Responsibilities: Perform on-page and off-page SEO optimization, including but not limited to meta tags, headers, URLs, and internal linking. Develop and implement SEO strategies to drive targeted traffic to the company website with a focus on lead generation. Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify high-value keywords relevant to our target audience and business objectives. Optimize website content, landing pages, and conversion funnels to improve user engagement and maximize lead generation. Collaborate with the marketing and sales teams to align SEO efforts with lead generation and conversion goals. Implement on-page and off-page SEO tactics to improve website visibility and search engine rankings. Monitor website performance metrics, including traffic, leads, and conversions, using tools such as Google Analytics and Google Search Console. Analyze user behavior and conversion data to identify areas for improvement and implement optimization strategies. Conduct A/B testing and optimization experiments to improve website conversion rates and lead quality. Implement technical SEO best practices to ensure website functionality, speed, and accessibility for both users and search engines. Stay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, algorithms, and best practices to maintain a competitive edge in lead generation and conversion optimization. Work closely with the web development team to implement SEO recommendations and ensure website compatibility with lead generation and payment processing tools. Monitor and optimize online payment processes to streamline the customer journey and maximize online sales conversions. Regularly report on SEO performance metrics, lead generation KPIs, and conversion rates to stakeholders. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field. 2-4 years of experience in SEO, digital marketing, or related roles, with a focus on lead generation and conversion optimization. Proven track record of successfully driving leads and increasing online sales through SEO strategies. Strong understanding of SEO principles, keyword research, on-page/off-page optimization, and technical SEO factors. Proficiency in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, etc. Experience with website optimization, conversion rate optimization (CRO), and A/B testing methodologies. Excellent analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to make informed decisions and optimize performance. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across teams and departments. Detail-oriented with a passion for continuous learning and staying updated on industry trends and best practices. Join us in driving the growth of business by leveraging your expertise in SEO, lead generation, and conversion optimization. If you are results-driven, creative, and passionate about maximizing online sales through SEO strategies, we would love to have you on our team!

column2: We seek a passionate and results-driven SEO Executive to join our team at Galaxy Weblinks      In this role, you will optimize websites for search engines, drive organic traffic, develop effective lead generation funnels, and provide exceptional client service for all analytics and SEO-related needs      Your expertise in on-page optimization, technical SEO, and advanced analytics will be essential in enhancing our clients online visibility and achieving their business objectives              Key Responsibilities:        ON-Page Optimization:      Conduct in-depth keyword research to identify relevant, high-value search terms.      Create and optimize website content, including landing pages, blog posts, and product descriptions, to enhance search engine rankings.      Optimize meta tags (title tags, meta descriptions) for maximum CTR (click-through rate).      Implement effective internal linking strategies to improve user experience and search engine crawlability.      Stay updated on the latest SEO best practices and algorithm changes.      Traffic Generation:      Develop and execute link-building strategies to increase the authority and credibility of client websites.      Collaborate with the content team to produce SEO-friendly content that attracts backlinks and drives organic traffic.      Identify and pursue opportunities for guest blogging and other off-page strategies to enhance brand visibility.      Organic Lead Funnel Development:      Design and optimize landing pages that are tailored for search intent and lead capture.      Collaborate with web developers to ensure SEO-friendly website design and functionality.      Implement and track conversion optimization initiatives to increase lead generation.      Monthly SEO Audits:      Perform comprehensive website audits to identify and address technical SEO issues that may be impeding rankings.      Conduct competitor analysis to benchmark performance and uncover new opportunities.      Prepare detailed SEO reports with actionable insights and recommendations.      Advanced Analytics Setup and Configuration:      Set up and configure analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, Google Tag Manager, and other SEO reporting platforms.      Create custom dashboards and reports to track key SEO metrics (organic traffic, rankings, conversions, bounce rate, etc.).      Analyze data to identify trends, opportunities for improvement, and demonstrate the ROI of SEO efforts.      Client Servicing:      Collaborate directly with clients to understand their analytics and SEO needs.      Provide expert setup and configuration of analytics tools to align with client goals.      Deliver regular reports and insights, translating complex data into clear action plans for clients.      Proactively address client inquiries and offer strategic SEO guidance.      Qualifications:      Bachelor s degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field or equivalent experience.      4+ years of proven experience in SEO, with a demonstrated track record of success.      Deep understanding of on-page and off-page optimization techniques.      Proficiency in keyword research tools (e.g., Keyword Planner, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Moz, etc.).      Experience with website analytics tools and reporting.      Strong analytical skills and data-driven decision-making.      Excellent written and verbal communication skills.      Desired Skills (Mandatory):      Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and basic web development principles.      Knowledgeable in utilizing the Screaming Frog tool for SEO analysis.      Extensive experience with Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and Google Tag Manager, alongside proficiency in Microsoft Clarity or similar heatmap analysis tools.      Hands-on experience in Keyword Planner, Ahrefs, SEMrush, Moz      Demonstrated ability in generating detailed reports using Excel and PowerPoint.      Expertise in Technical SEO with a solid understanding of optimizing website architecture and content for search engines.      Content marketing experience.      Desired Skills (Optional):      Experience with paid search (PPC) campaigns.

column2: As an SEO (Search Engine Optimization) executive, you will be responsible for improving the websites visibility and search engine ranking, analyzing and optimizing the content, and website performance to make it more attractive to search engines and increase its relevance to specific keywords and search queries                       What You'll Do               Conducting keyword research and analysis to identify relevant and high-value search terms that will drive traffic to the website.         Analyzing the website/URL structure, content, and performance to identify areas for optimization.         Implementing SEO strategies, including on-page and off-page optimization, link building, and technical SEO.         Monitoring and analyzing website traffic and performance data to track progress and identify areas for further optimization.         Staying up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, Google algorithm updates, and best practices.         Conducting regular site audits to identify technical issues that may be affecting SEO performance.         Communicating SEO performance and recommendations within the team.         Providing ideas for updating outdated content.         Technical content publishing- participating in testing-related technical platforms, including but not limited to blog republishing platforms, testing forums, and testing communities for backlinking.                  What You've Done Before                 In your previous role as an SEO Executive, youve executed SEO initiatives to improve your websites visibility and organic traffic.          When focusing on on-page strategies, you conducted extensive keyword research through tools like Google Keyword Planner and SEMrush, identifying the relevant keywords for the business.         To enhance user experience, you optimized meta tags, headings, and images and ensured keyword density and alignment within content.          Implementing schema markup, interlinking, and refining site structure improved indexing and search engine visibility.         Shifting to off-page efforts, you orchestrated successful link-building campaigns, reaching out to authoritative websites in your industry.          You conducted thorough competitor backlink research to identify valuable linking opportunities.          You were engaging in social bookmarking guest posting.          You've done technical content publishing, like forum participation and strategic blog republishing. You nurtured a diverse backlink portfolio.          Additionally, you used third-party multimedia platforms for image and video sharing, engaging wider audiences.         You executed successful email outreach campaigns for backlinks and published educational PDFs and whitepapers to secure high-quality backlinks from relevant domains.          By combining these strategies, you consistently boosted your websites domain authority (DA) and overall SEO performance.                 What You'll Need                 Bachelors degree in any stream.         2-4 years of proven experience (preferred - B2B SaaS) as an SEO Executive or a similar role.         In-depth knowledge of search engine optimization techniques, including link building, content marketing, and social media engagement.         Proficiency in using SEO tools and analytics platforms, such as Google Analytics, SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs, or similar tools.         Strong understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.         Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

column2: The Junior SEO Executive is a foundational role responsible for supporting search engine optimization efforts to improve online visibility, drive organic traffic, and enhance search engine rankings. This role requires a strong interest in SEO techniques, a willingness to learn, and the ability to collaborate with senior team members to contribute to digital marketing strategies.   Job Role & responsibility:      Keyword Research and Analysis:     Assist in conducting keyword research to identify relevant and valuable keywords for targeting.     Analyze keyword trends and search volumes to inform content strategies.     On-Page Optimization:     Support in optimizing website content, meta tags, headers, and other on-page elements for better search engine visibility.     Learn and apply basic SEO best practices to improve website performance.     Content Optimization:     Collaborate with content teams to optimize existing content for SEO purposes.     Learn to align content with target keywords and user intent.     Technical SEO:     Assist in conducting basic technical audits to identify website issues affecting SEO performance.     Learn about site structure, internal linking, and navigation improvements.     Link Building Support:     Assist in supporting link-building strategies, including outreach and partnerships.     Learn about backlink acquisition techniques and best practices.     Analytics and Reporting:     Learn to monitor website performance using SEO tools, providing basic reports on key metrics.     Develop basic data analysis skills to identify trends and insights.     Local SEO Awareness:     Gain awareness of local SEO strategies and tactics to improve local search presence.     Algorithm Updates and Learning:     Stay informed about search engine algorithm changes and industry trends under guidance.     Learn about compliance with search engine guidelines and best practices.     Collaboration and Learning:     Collaborate with senior team members to contribute to digital marketing campaigns and strategies.     Participate in learning sessions and training related to SEO techniques.

column2: As an SEO Analyst, your primary responsibility is to develop and implement effective search engine optimisation (SEO) strategies for websites. Youll be analysing website traffic and performance and adjusting SEO tactics to maximise user engagement and conversion rates. Youll also develop content creation strategies that incorporate SEO best practises and collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure digital marketing efforts remain aligned with overall business objectives.     Responsibilities        Strategic SEO Planning   : Develop and execute advanced SEO strategies that align with client objectives and industry trends. Create a roadmap for organic growth that includes technical, on-page, and off-page SEO elements.           Technical SEO Expertise   : Lead technical SEO audits to identify and resolve website issues that affect search engine performance.           E-commerce SEO Mastery   : Develop and execute advanced e-commerce SEO strategies, optimising product listings and category pages, and ensuring seamless user experiences for online shoppers.           SaaS Expertise   : Implement SEO tactics tailored to SaaS products, driving organic growth for software companies. Focus on keywords relevant to SaaS solutions and their unique buyer journeys.           Advanced Keyword Research   : Conduct comprehensive keyword research and competitive analysis. Identify high-converting keywords and optimise content for maximum visibility.           Content Optimisation   : Collaborate with content creators to develop content strategies that align with SEO goals and user intent and optimise.           Link Building   : Implement advanced link-building strategies, including outreach, partnerships, and content promotion. Acquire high-quality, authoritative backlinks to boost domain authority.           Performance Analysis   : Utilise advanced analytics tools to monitor and report on SEO performance. Analyse the data to provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement.           Algorithm Updates   : Stay up-to-date with search engine algorithm changes and emerging SEO trends. Adjust strategies as necessary to ensure compliance with best practises.     Requirements      Passion for SEO, the ability to think creatively and the ability to identify and rectify problems         4+ years of hands-on SEO experience, with a track record of driving organic growth and improving search rankings         Proficiency in advanced SEO tools and analytics platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs)         In-depth knowledge of technical SEO, on-page and off-page optimisation techniques, and SEO best practises         Strong understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and the ability to adapt strategies accordingly within e-commerce, SaaS, and tech domains         Exceptional problem-solving skills, strategic thinking, and a keen eye for detail         Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate with clients and team members         Proficiency in MS Excel, Word, and PowerPoint         Working experience in CMS and building/administering content in CMS environments         Comprehensive knowledge of HTML and CSS
