column2: Role & responsibilities:    Completely owning the responsibility of 5-6 SEO projects end-to-end, including on-page SEO, off-page SEO, technical SEO, content planning, and analytics. Conducting on-site and off-site SEO audits of your clients SEO competitors. Creation of holistic SEO strategies for clients in various industries. Using tools such as SEMRush, Google Analytics & Search Console to compile monthly performance reports and strategic suggestions. Assisting the content team in the creation of high-quality, informative SEO content via SEO inputs & topic research. Carrying out detailed keyword research according to the Brand Requirements. Paying particular attention to any significant Google algorithm changes and their impact on your projects. Having a good understanding of content quality and user engagement to be able to drive the right kind of content creation. Having a good understanding of different SEO strategies and their potential impact on different stages of projects. Ability to reach out to different website owners easily, create relationships, and strike deals for backlinks via different strategies. Maintaining SEO work trackers across multiple projects at once. Ability to lead a team of associates to drive work on SEO projects. Preferred candidate profile:    3-5 years of relevant experience in the White Hat SEO process. Knowledge of web development platforms such as WordPress, Shopify, Magento, etc. Strong analytical skills and strategic thinking ability. Should be able to lead multiple SEO projects simultaneously. Should have experience in eCommerce as well as non-eCommerce projects. Understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking methods. Experience with SEO tools like SEMRush. Knowledge of keyword research tools and the ability to complete competitive analysis of other companies within the industry. Excellent written and verbal communication skills (email, phone, etc.). Familiarity with WordPress/Shopify or other content management systems. Should be extremely focused on delivering results for clients. Prior experience in managing SEO clients. Perks and benefits:    Why should you join us? In case you value the opportunity to work on real & challenging Marketing problems In case you value high involvement from founders and learning from them In case you value having the autonomy to do things your way and not have to worry about experimental failures In case you care about working alongside genuine, honest peers who will have your back, no matter what In case you value contributing to the organization beyond your call of duty; and getting handsomely remunerated for the extra effort In case you believe in always learning and want an environment which will invest into your learning for the long term In case you want to work on the cutting edge of marketing problems and use the most cutting tools and strategies In case you are looking for a place for the long term where you can keep growing with the company (our first few hires from 5-6 years back, are still with the company) Why shouldn't you join us? In case you are looking for a product company, of course we aren't one In case you are looking for a very very structured corporate environment where everyone is extremely clear on their role and ONLY has to do that. We thrive as a bootstrapped company and hence like to be nimble about changes and whatever is needed to be done to get ahead In case you are looking for the top bracket pay in the industry - we are not the one for you. You may find hyper funded startups who can do that for you. Working Days: Monday to Friday (Onsite) + Saturday Half Day (WFH) Location: HSR Layout, Bangalore.

Requirements and Qualifications Proven Ecommerce SEO experience Proven SEM experience managing PPC campaigns across Google, Yahoo and Bing. Solid understanding of performance marketing, conversion, and online customer acquisition In-depth experience with website analytics tools (e.g, Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends) Experience with bid management tools (e.g., Click Equations, Marin, Search Ignite) Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments Knowledge of ranking factors and search engine algorithms Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in SEO and SEM BS/MS degree in a quantitative, test-driven field

column2: a mmerce About the role As an SEO Manager, you will help with Legend Footwears SEO strategy - developing and implementing effective search engine optimization strategies to improve the online visibility and organic search rankings of our company's websites. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, content, and development, to drive organic traffic growth, increase conversions, and enhance overall user experience.   Main Responsibilities Develop and execute successful SEO strategies, with a focus on ecommerce. Analyze the current business & prepare an organic growth plan. Take ownership of the organic growth plan & build the SEO team for the successful execution of the growth plan. Identify technical issues and work with the development team to resolve them. Collect data and report on traffic, rankings and other SEO aspects. Minimum requirements Sound understanding of ecommerce SEO including Google Merchant Center & Google My Business. Knowledge of product feed optimization. Understanding of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices. Prior experience with ecommerce, UI/UX & website architecture. Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data, perform keyword research, and generate insights. Working knowledge of GA4, Google Tag Manager, Tracking, Attribution & Pixel setup. Prior experience in a fast growth digital first business is a plus. To qualify for the position, the following workspace requirements must be met.  Workspace Requirements: Desktop computer with 3 extra monitors with a minimum screen size of 24 inches. A separate room dedicated to work, away from distractions, and not in a shared space Comfortable with installing an IP camera that provides a live video feed of your workplace during working hours Power backup in case of power outages Pay and benefits: Yearly service bonus equal to 10% of the annual salary Annual performance and pay package review

column2: As the Sr Manager of SEO, you will partner with our SEO agency to own and oversee SEO performance     This role is responsible for the planning, optimization, and reporting of all SEO initiatives to accelerate our monthly run-rate traffic and lead growth goals     You ll work closely with internal and external partners to implement best practices and strategic recommendations            What You Will Do          Serve as an SEO subject matter expert across the company, leading the performance and growth of the SEO channel.      Lead the partnership and monitor effectiveness of the external SEO agency, ensuring adherence and alignment toward key company goals and timelines, and implement strategic adjustments as necessary.      Partner with external SEO agency, internal Product, Technology, Merchandising and Content teams on technical SEO plan development, prioritization and lead processes ensuring SEO best practices are followed.      Plan and prioritize SEO campaigns across multiple domains with content marketing, development, and PR teams to execute results.      Work with external SEO agency to measure and track site ranking factors, keywords, internal and external links, and site content.      Utilize data visualization tool (Domo) to build dashboards and standardize reporting, allowing for real-time insights, data-driven decision making and goal setting.      Partner with Paid Media/SEM team to align paid and organic strategies.      Oversee and manage all link development processes and campaigns; manage external agency partners to improve ranking and traffic, and drive customer acquisition and revenue, both on-site and off-site.      Partner with external SEO agency to scope and write development requirements for new website features; attend sprint planning meetings.      Partner with external SEO agency to research and monitor competitor activity and search market industry trends to gain competitive advantage and innovate new strategies.      Collaborate with business teams and paid media departments to identify growth areas in branded and non-brand search.      Report and analyze results on key C-level KPIs including share of search, aggregate lead growth; plan and project monthly/quarterly targets.      Utilize a test learn mentality to drive continuously improved performance.      Audit and monitor website performance, ensuring a seamless cross-device experience.      Lead, coach and develop direct report(s) to manage workload, build scalable processes and further develop their skillset.          You re a great candidate if you have:          5-7 years of SEO experience, either in-house or at an agency, eCommerce experience required.      Excellent understanding of technical SEO requirements      Excellent understanding of web analytics (GA4)      Robust understanding of enterprise reporting tools (e.g. Domo)      Robust understanding of Ecommerce processes (product setup, inventory management, etc.)      Deep understanding of search engine ranking criteria, including local ranking factors      Experience working SEO tools Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, Brightedge, Botify etc.      Past-proven experience successfully managing and implementing SEO initiatives for enterprise websites.      Understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and/or other rich media technologies (website architecture a plus)      Ability to work with various types of data to develop and analyze trends and insights.      Experience leading teams to achieve / exceed goals.      Excellent written and oral communication skills, with the ability to present creative ideas and information clearly to executive leadership and cross functional partners.      High-level proficiency with Microsoft Applications (Excel, Word, PowerPoint)      Experience working in a fast-paced entrepreneurial and evolving high-growth business a plus.      Highly organized, accountable, and attentive to details      Understanding and acceptance of diversity, inclusion and belonging principles and best practices.

column2: We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced e-commerce SEO Expert to join our team and drive organic traffic, improve search engine rankings, and optimize our e-commerce website TJC      The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of e-commerce platforms, technical SEO principles, on-page optimization, website architecture, site speed optimization, structured data, XML sitemaps, mobile optimization, link building and analytics      You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement SEO best practices and ensure the strong organic presence of TJC across all the major search engines in the UK      You will have a pivotal role in one of the business most exciting and fast-growing departments, assisting in a digital transformation that will have the potential for a profound effect on the entire business              Role and responsibilities:          Conduct comprehensive technical SEO audits to identify and resolve website issues affecting search engine visibility, crawlability, and user experience.          Develop and execute comprehensive on-page and off-page SEO strategies for e-commerce, including optimizing category pages, improving internal linking, and building relevant external backlinks.          Implement and optimise XML sitemaps, robots.txt files, and canonical tags to guide search engine crawlers and manage duplicate content issues.          Identify and fix website errors, broken links, and 404 pages to improve user experience and search engine performance.          Conduct keyword research and analysis specific to e-commerce products to identify high-value keywords and phrases.          Optimize product pages for search engines, including meta tags, product descriptions, titles, and URLs, to improve organic search rankings and click-through rates.          Implement and optimise structured data markup (schema.org) to enhance search engine visibility and improve rich snippets in search results.          Ensure mobile-friendliness and responsiveness of the website.          Monitor website performance using SEO tools and platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Search Console) and provide actionable insights and recommendations.          Track, analyse, and report on key technical SEO metrics, such as website speed, crawl errors, indexation status, and mobile usability.          Conduct keyword research and analysis to uncover SEO opportunities and improve website relevancy.          Stay informed about emerging technologies and trends that may impact technical SEO, such as voice search and mobile-first indexing.          Stay updated with the latest SEO trends, industry developments, and search engine algorithm updates.          Qualifications and Experience:          Bachelors degree in marketing, computer science, or a related field.          Minimum of 5 years of experience as a SEO Expert, with a proven track record of optimising websites for search engine performance.          Ecommerce Exposure is must.          Extensive experience with technical website optimisation techniques, including website structure, internal linking, XML sitemaps, robots.txt, and canonical tags.          Proficiency in using SEO tools and platforms, such as GA4, Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, SEMRUSH and other website auditing tools.          Strong knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and ranking factors.          Expertise in website speed optimization techniques, and performance analysis tools.          Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as they relate to technical SEO.          Proficiency in mobile optimization best practices and mobile-friendly website design.          Familiarity with structured data markup (schema.org) and its implementation for enhanced search results.          Up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, industry developments, and search engine algorithm updates.          Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.          Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.

column1: SEO Specialist & Creative Copywriter ( Remote From Home _
column2: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled SEO & Brand Creative Copywriter who excels in both technical search engine optimization and engaging brand storytelling for our eCommerce business. This position requires proficiency in a comprehensive range of SEO tools and techniques, along with a talent for creating content that resonates with our audience and adheres to our brands voice. Key Responsibilities: Advanced SEO Technical Skills: Expertly manage Google Search Console for tracking and optimizing keyword performance and identifying site issues. Optimize website speed to ensure maximum performance across all devices. Utilize SEMrush and other SEO tools for keyword research, competitive analysis, and comprehensive SEO audits. Regularly monitor and adjust keyword positions to maintain and improve search engine rankings. Implement and manage URL redirections, site migrations, and ensure the technical robustness of the website's SEO structure. Keyword Research and Page Optimization: Conduct in-depth keyword research to identify opportunities for increasing visibility and rankings. Optimize web pages for targeted keywords, including meta tags, headings, and content optimization to boost SEO and user engagement. Develop and execute strategies for Google Maps optimization to enhance local search visibility. Directories Submission: Submit website details to relevant directories and business listings to improve backlink profile and local SEO efforts. Manage and optimize business profiles across directories to ensure consistency and accuracy of information. Brand Creative Copywriting: Create compelling, SEO-friendly content for products, blogs, and marketing campaigns that reflect the brand's tone and appeal to target demographics. Continuously update content to keep it fresh and relevant, ensuring it aligns with SEO strategies and brand standards. Analytics and Reporting: Use advanced analytics tools to monitor, analyze, and report on SEO performance and content effectiveness. Make data-driven decisions to refine SEO tactics and content strategies for optimal results. Collaboration and Innovation: Work closely with marketing, design, and tech teams to foster an integrated approach to digital marketing. Stay updated with the latest SEO trends, algorithm updates, and best practices to keep ahead in a dynamic digital environment. Requirements: Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, English, or a related field. Proven experience in SEO management and creative copywriting, especially within an eCommerce context. Deep understanding of SEO tools like Google Search Console, SEMrush, and others. Strong writing, editing, and proofreading skills, with a robust portfolio showcasing creative and SEO-driven content. Extensive knowledge of SEO techniques including keyword research, page optimization, directory submissions, and Google Maps optimization. Preferred Skills: Strong analytical skills to evaluate complex data and adjust strategies accordingly. Creative thinker capable of crafting compelling stories that also meet SEO needs. Thorough understanding of the technical challenges and opportunities within SEO and digital marketing. Application Process: Interested candidates should submit a resume, a cover letter, and samples of both SEO analytical work and creative content writing to [insert email/contact details].

column2: We are looking for an    SEO Specialist   , who can support the development and execution of SEO strategies for our websites. This role requires thinking quantitatively, analytically, and creatively to deliver results. A successful SEO Specialist will hold a key skill: a strong understanding of organic marketing campaign principles. They will use a mastery of Technical SEO and Content SEO to build well-rounded strategies and executable plans. They cannot just measure and analyze, but must provide insights for change and guidance to improve our digital presence, and associated marketing programs and campaigns.         This role requires a desire to ask questions to understand key behavior, a high attention to detail, and strong critical thinking as different datasets must be analyzed to find answers to these questions.           Responsibilities             Develop SEO strategies yielding results that meet the company s goals.         Work collaboratively with digital cross-functional teams to ensure that our organic SEO goals can be tracked and reported appropriately.         Providing a wide range of data analysis for different websites.         Analyze search ranking issues (organic and blended maps results, utilizing databases, search engines, navigation services, social-local, business directories, and business review insights during audits).         Have a strong understanding and skill set in technical SEO, offering insights in areas including crawling, indexation, ranking signals, and site authority. Continually offering recommendations for improvements that follow SEO best practices.         Identify technical SEO problems, utilize proper tools for research and discovery, and be able to provide recommendations and solutions.         Interact with development teams to provide implementation requirements.         Test and provide quality assurance feedback to the various development teams.         Provide reports and dashboards with insights that drive changes in the business.         Stay abreast of web analytics trends and best practices.         Lead efforts to research and evaluate new tools/capabilities in the analytics industry.         Perform ad-hoc analysis as necessary to answer business questions and drive decisions.         Perform SEO, SEM and other digital campaign-related tasks, such as metadata updates, keyword research, and creating redirect tables and spreadsheets.         Conduct researching and scraping of competitor websites.         Find content gaps as well as keywords for increasing traffic to landing pages.                     Qualifications             Bachelor s degree in computer science, marketing, communications, or general business or equivalent education.         At least 2 years professional experience directly performing SEO tasks.         At least 2 years internal or agency experience with SEO.         2 years of experience with Google Analytics and other analytics tools.         1-2 years of experience with a tag management tool. JavaScript experience a plus, but not required.         Experience communicating SEO strategies and goals and collaborating with internal teams, including designers, content strategists and writers, digital marketing manager and product owners.         Experience in digital analytics, applying data-based findings to generate specific site improvements.         Excellent critical thinking skills and strong written and verbal communication are required.         In-depth knowledge of Internet terminology, KPI creation, pathing and engagement analysis and tagging experience also required.         Proven skills working with internal marketing team to understand their business needs and respond with appropriate recommendations.         Ability to multitask, prioritize, and organize while meeting deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Conduct regular follow up and follow through.                     Key Qualities             Strong problem-solving skills         Effective verbal and written communication skills         Demonstrated ability to analyze raw data and recommend strategies based on findings         Possess keen attention to detail         Exercise independent judgment, work well under pressure, and manage concurrent projects         Demonstrated flexibility in job responsibilities

column2: POSITION- SEO Specialist Location- Ludhiana ABOUT THE COMPANY Welcome to Acme Visa, a dynamic IT startup fueled by a visionary mission to revolutionize the immigration landscape. Our core objective? To craft a one-of-a-kind platform that reshapes the way the world approaches immigration, empowering individuals and families to embark on transformative journeys across borders. Situated in the bustling hub of Metro Vancouver, Acme Visa stands as a premier full-service Immigration Consulting Firm, dedicated to providing comprehensive immigration solutions. What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to empowering people to move globally, transcending boundaries and unlocking new opportunities for personal and professional growth. At Acme Visa, we understand the profound impact that immigration can have on individuals and communities worldwide. That's why we've made it our mission to offer innovative solutions that streamline the immigration process, making it accessible and achievable for everyone, regardless of their background or circumstances. As a global immigration firm, Acme Visa serves clients from diverse cultural backgrounds and geographical locations. Our team of experienced consultants leverages their expertise and insights to navigate the complexities of immigration laws and regulations, ensuring seamless transitions for our clients as they embark on their global journeys. Whether you're seeking to reunite with loved ones, pursue educational opportunities abroad, or pursue career advancement in new territories, Acme Visa is here to support you every step of the way. We believe in empowering individuals to seize new opportunities, embrace cultural diversity, and build a brighter future for themselves and their families. Join us as we embark on a mission to empower the world through immigration. Welcome to Acme Visa, where borders are no barrier to ambition, and the world is yours to explore. column2: We are seeking an experienced SEO Analyst to join our Marketing team and contribute to building a strong online presence. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of SEO techniques and tools, along with excellent analytical skills and a strong history using Python for data analysis as well as experience with Python NLP libraries. As an SEO Analyst, you will play a crucial role in optimizing our websites performance, monitoring user engagement, and implementing effective SEO strategies to attract and convert our target audience.                                       What you ll do     how you ll make your mark                 Utilize Python for statistical analysis of SEO data to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities for optimization.             Develop and implement SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and drive traffic to our website.             Collaborate with content creators to optimize on-page content for target keywords and improve overall search visibility.             Perform competitive analysis to identify strengths and weaknesses in our SEO strategy compared to competitors.             Track and analyze important SEO metrics including organic traffic, conversion rates, time spent on page, and others to assess the effectiveness of SEO efforts.             Update older content and incorporate effective calls to action (CTAs) to improve user engagement and encourage conversions.             Report on performance metrics, comparing them to our SEO goals and benchmarking data to measure progress and identify areas for improvement.             Optimize web pages for desktop/mobile devices and ensure a seamless user experience across all devices.             Stay up-to-date with SEO trends, tools, and best practices to ensure the implementation of cutting-edge strategies.                             Who you are what you ll need to succeed:                 Proven work experience as an SEO Analyst or similar digital marketing role.             Python experience - data analysis and NLP libraries             Expertise in Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics and other relevant SEO tools for data analysis and performance tracking.             Familiarity with keyword research and management tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs, etc.             In-depth understanding of ranking factors and search engine optimization practices.             Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data sets and draw actionable insights.             Bachelors degree in marketing, Statistics or a relevant field.

column2: We are seeking an experienced  SEO Manager  with a strong focus on technical SEO and user experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of technical SEO best practices, website architecture, and user behaviour to drive improvements in search engine visibility and user engagement. Responsibilities: Lead the development and execution of technical SEO strategies to optimize website performance and enhance search engine rankings. Conduct comprehensive technical SEO audits to identify and address issues affecting crawlability, indexing, and site speed. Collaborate with developers and IT teams to implement technical SEO recommendations and best practices, including schema markup, XML sitemaps, and canonicalization. Monitor website performance metrics and user experience indicators, such as bounce rate, time on page, and conversion rates, to identify opportunities for improvement. Work closely with UX/UI designers to optimize website navigation, site architecture, and on-page elements for improved user experience and search engine visibility. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in technical SEO, user experience design, and search engine algorithms to inform strategy and decision-making. Provide regular reporting and analysis of technical SEO performance to key stakeholders, including recommendations for optimization and improvement. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in marketing, computer science, or a related field. Proven experience as an SEO Manager or similar role, with a focus on technical SEO and user experience optimization. In-depth knowledge of technical SEO best practices, including website architecture, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and server-side factors. Experience with SEO tools such as Screaming Frog, DeepCrawl, Google Search Console, and Google Analytics. Strong understanding of user experience principles and best practices, with the ability to translate technical optimizations into improved user engagement and satisfaction. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret data and make actionable recommendations. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally with other teams. Creative thinking and a passion for staying ahead of industry trends and developments in SEO and user experience design. Preferred Qualifications: Certifications in SEO or related fields (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads, Moz). Experience with A/B testing and conversion rate optimization (CRO) strategies. Knowledge of content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress, Magento, or Shopify.   Join our team and help us elevate our digital presence through technical SEO excellence and user-centric design. If you're passionate about optimising websites for both search engines and users, we'd love to hear from you.

column2: The SEO Head Spearheads all activities of the SEO department and is in direct supervision of the SEO Managers and supporting personnel.         He\She is accountable for the performance of the content optimized through the initiatives of the SEO department and also sets quarterly and yearly performance targets and ensures that all content campaigns are ran within the given budgets and deadlines.         He\She is tasked with determining the strategic direction of content campaigns for the business, and ensures that these strategies are in line with the business s overall goals and objectives in order to attract the anticipated social value.         Plays the role of reviewing the business s content on a regular basis in an attempt to identify opportunities, points of improvement, and creative solutions for the business s SEO programs.         Also works closely with the Content Editing and Content Marketing departments along with junior SEO personnel in tailoring optimized content for the business both in online and offline programs. He\She also collaborates with third party influencers, for example, journalists, in order to drive link building opportunities for the business.         He\She conducts relevant SEO research on the business s content and takes a data-driven approach in the creation of audience profiles that in turn form the basis of SEO strategies.         The Head of SEO employs the use of several SEO related tools such as Google Analytics and Webmaster in identifying trends, issues, and opportunities in the business s sites, blogs, and pages and to further ensure that they are optimized to drive higher rankings. On top of this, he\she also takes charge of conducting SEO audits, development of Google algorithms, and even sometimes engages in the measurement of the effectiveness of PPC activity by applying relevant monitoring tools.           Requirements         Candidate for this position must possess a master s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, An equivalent of the same in working experience is also acceptable.         The candidate must have a proven and successful track record of 5 years in the designing and delivery of SEO plans and strategies in fast paced businesses, preferably performing the functions of the Senior SEO Manager.         The Candidate must have a proven ability to take responsibility and sensibly account for a team s performance. As a bonus, the He\she will also have experience in influencer marketing and have a passion for all things social in the business s market field.         He\She should portray great analytical skills and is able to draw insight from raw information and data acquired through field research. He will have the ability to analyze this data for the purpose of determining SEO strategies, approaches, and content planning.         Must also be extremely proficient in content management systems, for example, WordPress. He must also be proficient in web analytics softwares and platforms such as Google Analytics, Coremetrics, Omniture, Moz, Majestic, Webmaster, SEMRush, Omniture, Screaming Frog, etc         Candidate for this position will not only demonstrate great understanding of SEO but also of various digital marketing channels, for example, PR, web development, content creation, social media, on-site usability, off-site optimization, among others. In addition to this, the Head of SEO will show superior proficiency in HTML, CSS and other valuable media technologies. He will also be proficient in scripting languages such as .php etc.         Must have excellent communication skills both in verbal and written form.

column2: Job Title: SEO Executive Location:  Noida Day : Monday to Friday We are seeking a motivated and experienced SEO Executive to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of SEO practices and the latest industry trends, with a proven track record of improving website rankings and increasing organic traffic. As an SEO Executive, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective search engine optimization strategies to enhance our online presence and drive our business goals. Key Responsibilities: Conduct keyword research to identify target keywords and phrases. Work in Backlinking & WordPress. Develop and execute on-page and off-page SEO strategies. Optimize website content, including meta tags, headers, URLs, and images. Ensure website structure and navigation support search engine crawlability and indexability. Collaborate with content creators to optimize content for search engines and user experience. Ensure all content is aligned with SEO best practices and business goals. Develop and implement a content calendar to ensure regular, fresh content updates. Conduct regular technical SEO audits and implement necessary changes. Monitor and resolve issues related to site performance, such as page speed and mobile usability. Ensure website security and accessibility compliance. Develop and execute effective link-building strategies. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, IT, or a related field. Proven experience as an SEO Executive or similar role. In-depth knowledge of SEO practices, tools, and techniques. Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and website administration. Excellent analytical, organizational, and communication skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Detail-oriented with a strong focus on accuracy and quality. Note: This is a work-from-office requirement. There are no walk-in interviews; only virtual interviews will be conducted.

column2: For the post of SEO Specialist, the ideal candidate will have 2-5 years of experience in online marketing with a well-rounded background in search management. The candidate should have specific experience focused on analyzing and increasing organic search traffic through both, technical website factors and authority building as well as on-page and off-page optimization. This person will be responsible for implementing methods to improve clients' website?s organic rankings as well as documenting SEO/Social changes, and communicating changes to team members.  We?re looking for someone to become a core member of our team, interested in working in a fast-pace, small business environment, who is eager to learn, stay up-to-date on the latest internet marketing techniques, and help grow our digital marketing agency. The ideal candidate needs to be organized, understand business drivers, and possess effective communication skills.   Qualifications:     Proficient in using various SEO softwares and cloud services     Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and it's applicable usage in SEO     Excellent communication and writing skills in English     2-5 years experience in SEO and Online Marketing     Bachelor?s Degree in Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Economics, Math, or related field is a plus but not required   Desired Skills & Experience:     Understanding of front-end web development     Web development experience or HTML coding knowledge will be a plus     Experience with WordPress Additional Information: Essential Duties & Core Responsibilities: Strategy, Proposals, & Audits:     Strategy: Develop SEO strategies for clients based on keyword research, keyword strategy, competitive analysis, domain authority, current rankings, and other factors that contribute to developing an successful SEO campaign.     Proposals: Create SEO proposals based on strategic research, offering several options in a clear, concise way that meet client needs and result in a successful SEO campaign.     Audits: Evaluate websites based on technical factors, on-page analysis, and backlink profiles to summarize the current SEO strength of a website.  Troubleshoot errors via Webmaster Tools and produce an audit that summarizes a website?s SEO situation.   SEO Strategy:     Industry research & competitive analysis     Research, analyze, and develop a keyword strategy     Monitor ranking reports and adjust strategy as necessary     Monitor traffic performance and quantify results using Google Analytics     Complete monthly client reports   On-Page SEO Strategy:     Make on-site recommendations (Title, H1, Content ? familiarity with HTML is necessary)     Implement recommended changes in client CMS / Website     Complete technical website audit reports & recommend changes   Off-Page SEO Strategy     Develop and execute effective authority building strategies     Engage in social strategies to promote clients and increase authority     Perform link pruning and backlink audits to help clients have a clean link profile which is safe from any penalties from search engines
